tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SalesData (
    sale_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    sale_amount DECIMAL,
    customer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE sales_data (
    sales_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name TEXT,
    sale_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    sale_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE sales_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sale_date DATE,
    product_id INT,
    quantity_sold INT,
    price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    quantity_ordered INT,
    order_date DATE
);
